data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Huaihua, Hunan, China know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Huaihua, Hunan, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Huaihua do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Huaihua, Hunan, China not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Huaihua, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Miao, Baishi people.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Huaihua.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 82,074 believers in the county of Huaihua into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Please, convict the 82,074 believers in Huaihua, Hunan, China to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

location.name: Huaihua
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Waxiang, Ghao-Xong, Eastern, Kim Mun, Baheng, Phula
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Waxiang (375,000), Ghao-Xong, Eastern (137,000), Kim Mun (338,000), Baheng (48,000), Phula (7,300)
